description: Data was extracted from an older CCLE dataset from Google Genomics on February 2016. File metadata information including deprecated full cloud-storage-paths for BAM and SNP CEL files are made available here.

fields.description: Cell line primary name, appended with a short name for the location  of the cancer; e.g. TC71_BONE, HUPT4_PANCREAS, etc
fields.name: CCLE_name

fields.description: Cell line primary name, e.g. TC-71, NIH:OVCAR-3, etc
fields.name: Cell_line_primary_name

fields.description: Full CCLE cell line identifier, e.g. CCLE-JHUEM-3-DNA-08
fields.name: SampleBarcode

fields.description: Short name of the contributing data center, e.g. bcgsc.ca
fields.name: DataCenterName

fields.description: Google Cloud Storage path to file
fields.name: CloudStoragePath

fields.description: Specific genome build that was used as the basis for analysis, e.g. hg19 (GRCh37)
fields.name: GenomeReference

fields.description: A combination of the center and the platform that can distinguish between two ways of performing the sequencing or assay for the same platform, e.g. bcgsc.ca__miRNASeq
fields.name: Pipeline

fields.description: Platform used to generate these data (Genome_Wide_SNP_6)
fields.name: Platform
